$comment: This schema describes the meta-structure of an iTwin Settings Schema file. It is used to provide a guide for the schema files themselves.

typeDefs.description: A group of type definitions that can be extended in setting definitions.

schemaPrefix.description: The unique prefix of the schema.

order.description: An integer value used to sort the schema in a user interface list of multiple schemas, where schemas of lower order are sorted before those with higher order.
